#Text= Sozin says : " How dare you , a citizen of the Fire Nation , address your Fire Lord this way .

column1: #Text=Your loyalty is to our nation first .
#Text=" Roku says : " Do n't do this , Sozin .
#Text=" Roku says : " I 'm sparing you , Sozin .
#Text=I 'm letting you go in the name of our past friendship .
#Text=Even a single step out of line will result in your permanent end .
